core_meaning: Sextile between Mars and Mercury opens opportunity/skill. Mars: drive, assertion, surgery, mechanics, conflict. Mercury: analysis, communication, commerce, learning, tech. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Execution speed, competition, technical grit.  Negotiation, analytics, documentation, skilling. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Desire, boundaries, anger management.  Dialog, problem-solving, curiosity. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Risk-capital, decisive investments, initiative-led gains.  Trading, freelancing, multi-stream income, contracts. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Inflammation, accidents; channel via training.  Nervous system, breath, routine mobility. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.
Impulsive actions or accidents; channel energy into training.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
